text: Showed up on time for my online order pickup. They hadn't even started my order. Stood there 10 min, then someone says, itll be 15 min. Have a pop. …More

name: peisli
text: We used to go to Hungry Howie's in NC and loved it. I went here 2 days ago. This location is very clean, with a friendly service and food is same great quality as in North Carolina. I ordered ham and cheese sandwich, 7 minutes later it was ready.

text: They're food is always amazing. It's just that last time I ordered Howie bread I found a dime underneath one of my pieces. It was weird to say the least. Good food though.

text: So, this location has always been a 5* for me, but lately...their quality has plummeted. …More

text: Everything I have had here so far has been delicious they are so generous with toppings and the flavor is poppin'. The rewards program is so cool! The delivery drivers are kind. They are amazing.

name: Alan Walker
text: I called to oder a buffalo chicken pizza. they had forgot to pull chicken from the freezer. So I got a supreme pizza which wasn't great at all. So today I call again to order a buffalo chicken pizza. And I tell them about the pizza I didn't …More

name: Kayla Wagar
text: I just had Hungry Howie's for the first time  yesterday and the service was great. The staff was very friendly and the pizza was delicious. I will be back again!

name: Daniel Bronson
text: There is an excellent service that brings a family like setting. The food is lovely especially if you enjoy the flavored crust. Management here is kind, understanding, and makes me want to come back for pizza. I love you Hungry Howies!

name: Jessica Campagiorni
text: Order pizza and bread for delivery, well the pizza was soggy and they didn't bring the bread , delivery driver said she would bring the bread back but never did so I called and was told to bad they couldn't do anything about my missing bread....ugh very unprofessional will not be ordering from here again

text: This was my first order from you and my last. I order a small pizza and a small Caesar salad. Order showed up 45 mins later with just a small pizza. About half hour later driver cameback with my salad and 7 packs of croutons and no dressing. I could have went to a restaruant and had a better meal for less money.

food is AWESOME ! and got great prompt service !

text: Had to call three times, took them and hour and 15 minutes to drive down the road and give me my food! And it was absolutely disgusting! The calzone was cold and soggy, the wings have the texture of a dogs chew toy the BBB will be in contact with this store.

text: Sub was delivered without dressing and mayo packet that i was charged for.  Sub meat and lettuce tasted old.  Threw away half of the sub because it tasted that bad. Yet another bad experience from Monroe Hungry Howies
